actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: To authorize security assistance for the Kosova Liberation Army to be used for training and support for their established self-defense forces in order to defend and protect the civilian population of Kosova against armed aggression.
short_title: Kosovar Independence and Justice Act of 1999

summary.text: Kosovar Independence and Justice Act of 1999 - Authorizes appropriations for grants to the Kosova Liberation Army for training and support of their established self-defense forces in order to protect the civilian population of Kosova against armed aggression.

titles.title: Kosovar Independence and Justice Act of 1999

To authorize security assistance for the Kosova Liberation Army to be used for training and support for their established self-defense forces in order to defend and protect the civilian population of Kosova against armed aggression.
